reviews.review_msg: Geoff is a really good person, but a horrible lecturer. He's very slow, doesn't explain things well in a lecture setting (he's much better one-on-one) and because of these reasons a lot of students aren't taught the important content that show up on the exams. If you're taking 121, take it with another prof if at all possible.
Geoffery explains complicated problems really well, I really enjoyed his lectures.

Geoffrey Tien could stand to be more engaging with his classes. His lectures were incredibly boring, I found myself falling asleep many times. The course is a hard one so not falling behind is important but the style of teaching made it much harder to endure.
